attributes.action: To support Great Ormond Street Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are ordinary people on a message board, we have tried to get Justice for Baby Peter, and so far he has lost in death as he lost in life, he has received no Justice. we would like you the PM to support the Charity Hospital please.

rejection.details: It is unclear what action you are requesting the PM to take.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
